choices: Insist that the wedding be here
1.content:
After the initial excitement of your engagement it is time to begin seriously planning the wedding.

"How do you feel about having it in Deloma?" Samantha suggests. "You haven't seen my home country yet."
1.title: Planning the big day

choices: Agree that you'd rather stay in a hotel
11.content:
"If that's what you want." you say. "We can have the wedding there."

"Thank you honey." she hugs you. "And you won't have to worry about anything. My family will organize all of it."

So it was decided and, as promised, Samantha's parent's took care of everything.

A week from the big day, you and Samantha fly into Deloma. You are met at the airport by her mother and Father.

You reach out to shake the hand of Samantha's father, Tony. "It's good to finally meet you Mr Jensen."

He glances submissively at his wife, Tanya who then hugs you tightly. "You look exhausted. Let's get you home so you can take a nap."

"Actually." Samantha says. "I though Michael might be more comfortable in a hotel.."
11.title: Hold the wedding in Deloma

111.content:
"We don't want to impose on you." you say. "I think we'll stay in a hotel."

"If that's what you want." Mrs Jensen accepts your answer. "Let's get your things into the car."

You are surprised when it is Mrs Jensen and not her husband who sits behind the steering wheel, although it is in keeping with his submissive personality.

During the drive to the hotel you begin to notice a smell. Almost like someone farted but somehow different, like they'd messed their pants or something."
111.title: Agree that you'd rather stay in a hotel

choices: Wait until you are alone with Samantha to ask again
Ask Mrs Jensen if her husband really wears diapers
1111.content:
"Um.." you say, not sure how to say this without being rude. "What is that smell."

"Oh" Mrs Jensen says. "I suspect Tony just needs a diaper change. He usually messes at about this time."

"What?" you ask, shocked partially from the answer but mostly from it's casual delivery.

"Your dad wears diapers?" you whisper to Samantha, although discretion is largely irrelevant now.

Samantha just nods, apparently reluctant to discuss the issue at this moment.
1111.title: Ask about the smell

11111.content:
You get checked in to the hotel and Samantha's parents finally leave.

"Okay." you say finally. "What's up with your father?"

"What do you mean?" Samantha asks innocently.

"He wears diapers?" you ask. "What's wrong with him?"

She sighs. This is obviously an explanation that she knew would have to be given eventually, but she's not quite ready yet.

"There's nothing wrong with him." she says, leading you to sit on the bed. "It's a tradition here. All married men are kept in diapers."

"What?" you ask. "That's crazy."

"It's our culture." she says. "The woman is the head of the household and she keeps her husband in diapers to demonstrate that."

"Wait" you say. "What do you mean 'our' culture? You don't plan to do that to me?"

She takes in a deep breath. "Just, while we are here." she says. "My mother insists."
11111.title: Wait until you are alone with Samantha to ask a...

choices: Tell her that's too much, you can't do it
111111.content:
"That's pretty weird." you say. "But if it's the tradition here then I'll go along with it."

"Really?" she asks, but, not waiting for an answer, she hugs you. "Thank you honey. I love you so much."

"So what do I have to do exactly?" you ask.

"Nothing until the wedding." she say. "In the ceremony you have to wet yourself to show that you accept your new position. Then I change you into a diaper."

"In front of everyone?" you ask.

"Yes." she says. "It's a public demonstration of your surrender to my care."
111111.title: Agree to keep the tradition

1111112.content:
You walk up to her, and grasp her in a deep, embracing hug.
"If it means that I can spent my life with the woman I love, I will do it." You say kissing her.
She collapses into your arms, "Thank you."
1111112.title: Tell her you'll do it

112.content:
"I'd love to stay with you." you contradict Samantha, who looks worried by this.

However Her mother is much happier with you choice. "Good. It's decided." she says. "Let's get your things into the car."

You are surprised when it is Mrs Jensen and not her husband who sits behind the steering wheel, although it is in keeping with his submissive personality.

During the drive to the hotel you begin to notice a smell. Almost like someone farted but somehow different, like they'd messed their pants or something."
112.title: Stay with Samantha's family

choices: Wait until you are alone with Samantha to ask again
Ask Mrs Jensen if her husband really wears diaper
1121.content:
"Um.." you say, not sure how to say this without being rude. "What is that smell."

"Oh" Mrs Jensen says. "I suspect Tony just needs a diaper change. He usually messes at about this time."

"What?" you ask, shocked partially from the answer but mostly from it's casual delivery.

"Your dad wears diapers?" you whisper to Samantha, although discretion is largely irrelevant now.

Samantha just nods, apparently reluctant to discuss the issue at this moment.
1121.title: Ask about the smell

choices: Ask if she noticed the smell
1122.content:
You can't think of a polite way to ask so instead you discretely wind down your window.

After a short drive you arrive at Mr and Mrs Jensen's house. The mysterious smell follows you inside.

"You can have your old room." Mrs Jensen tells her daughter. "Show Michael to the guest room while I take care of your father." She takes her husband by the hand and leads him down the corridor.

"We don't get to stay in the same room?" you ask a little disappointed.

"I guess not." she says, leading you to your room. "And you'd better not try anything while my parents are around."

"At least the smell seems to have gone." you mumble to yourself.

"What was that?" Samantha asks.
1122.title: Don't mention the smell

choices: Say that you can pay to fly her immediate family here
Suggest that the honeymoon be in Deloma
12.content:
"But all of our friends are here." you insist. "We can't expect them all to fly to another country."

"What about my family?" she asks.
12.title: Insist that the wedding be here

info.brief_description: You find yourself in a culture where married men are kept in diapers by their wives.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You are Michael Harris, a young man who is engaged to a woman named Samantha Jensen. She is from a place named Deloma.

It is a small nation with a strange culture. Specifically, married men are kept in diapers by their wives.

The history books of Deloma say that the women grew tired of being dominated by men and banded together. They refused to marry any man who would not accept the woman as the head of their household.

They kept their husbands, the ones who accepted the new arrangement, in diapers to remind them of their status in the family. Many women go further and choose to treat their husbands completely like toddlers, or even little girls.

You were unaware of any of this until you suddenly find yourself expected to conform to it.
